Name: Incandescence
Description: Weapon's final ATK is increased by 15% at the start of battle. No duration limit.

Name: Dead Point Countdown
Description: Gain 1 additional Signal Orb at the start of battle, and 3 identical skill orbs every 45s.

Name: Matrix Lightning
Description: After EX Dodge, Movement Speed is greatly increased and all enemies take 10% more DMG in Matrix.

Name: Incandescence
Description: Weapon's final ATK is increased by 15% at the start of battle. No duration limit.

Name: Dead Point Countdown
Description: Gain 1 additional Signal Orb at the start of battle, and 3 identical skill orbs every 45s.

Name: Matrix Lightning
Description: After EX Dodge, Movement Speed is greatly increased and all enemies take 10% more DMG in Matrix.

Name: Resonance Vibration
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15% when combo is greater than 50.

Name: Saturated Loading
Description: Consume Red, Yellow and Blue Signal Orbs within 5s to increase all DMG dealt by 15% for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Dodge Echo
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Predator's Maxim
Description: All DMG increased by 20% when attacking enemies in a burning area.

Name: Cycle of Stars
Description: Skill - Space Lord deals 10% more DMG. Physical DMG is increased by 15% for 5s after a 3-Ping. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Unbranded Slash
Description: Red Orb DMG increased by 15%.

Name: Phantom Sword
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to call down a lightning strike that deals 50% Physical DMG. 3s cooldown.

Name: One With Armor
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Blade of Fury
Description: Basic Attack DMG increased by 10%. Physical DMG increased by 5% for 2s after each Basic Attack. Stacks up to 5 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Inverse Shadow
Description: When dealing Lightning DMG, Lightning DMG Bonus is increased by 5% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. When casting a Signature Move, Extra DMG is increased by 10% for 10 seconds. Duration refreshes after the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Energy Incarnate
Description: All DMG increased by 5%. Pinging an orb will accumulate energy based on the number of orbs pinged. Consume 50 energy to summon Sirius for 45s. 60s cooldown. Its power as a weapon is nothing to write home about, but it is much sought after for its attractive appearance.

Name: Falling Blossoms
Description: For each orb pinged, Physical DMG increased by 2% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. Gain an extra Swordwave Orb in Swordwave Mode. 10s cooldown.

Name: Deep Pursuit
Description: Basic Attack DMG increased by 10%.

Name: Chain Combo
Description: Gain 1 Signal Orb every 30 combo. 8s cooldown.

Name: Jet Boost
Description: ATK increased by 20% for 4s after an EX Dodge. Gain 1 Signal Orb when the effect ends.

Name: Original Number
Description: Laser Shot DMG increased by 50%. Gain 15% ATK after a 3-Ping for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Ring of Praise
Description: For every 12 orbs pinged, increases all DMG dealt by the allies within 5m by 10% for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. DMG against Imprisoned enemies increased by 10%.

Name: Storm Hunt
Description: Basic Attacks have a 10% chance to inflict Frail, reducing the target's ATK by 10% for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. Attacking a Frail enemy has a 10% chance to restore 1 orb. 6s cooldown.

Name: Concentrated Neutralization
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15% if you attack the same target for 5s.

Name: Sharpshooter
Description: CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG increased by 10% if there are no enemies within 2m.

Name: New Moon
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Now, I Am the Master
Description: Signature Move DMG increased by 15%. When a Signature Move hits an enemy, increases its Physical DMG taken by 2% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 8 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Shed Excess
Description: Physical DMG increased by 10% for 3s when switching targets.

Name: Echo Halls
Description: Attacks have a 30% chance to inflict Broken Armor, reducing an enemy's DEF by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Chain of Stars
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Fusion Shadow
Description: Attacks have a 20% chance to inflict Breach, dealing 2% Physical DMG per second for 3s. The chance is doubled if the enemy's DEF has been reduced. Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. Physical DMG increased by 10% when attacking a Breached enemy.

Name: Fire Chain
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to reduce the target's Fire Resistance by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown against the same target. A Signature Move increases Fire DMG by 20% and doubles the chance of reducing the target's Resistance.

Name: Precision Suppression
Description: The first Basic Attack hit on a target is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. 15s cooldown against the same target.

Name: Variable Arms
Description: Attacks have a 10% chance to unleash a shockwave, dealing 100% Physical DMG to enemies in the area.

Name: One With Armor
Description: ATK is increased by 30% for 4s after an EX Dodge.

Name: Unified Will
Description: Physical DMG increased by 15%. Upon a successful parry, DMG of the next skill is increased by 30%.

Name: Shadow Burst
Description: After a 3-Ping, Physical DMG and Dark DMG dealt increased by 20% for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Broken Helix
Description: Basic Attack DMG increased by 10%.

Name: Unquenchable
Description: ATK increased by 12% for 4s after a 3-Ping. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Light Firecrackers
Description: When Artillery Tactics or Thermal Armament is active, dealing damage causes a firecracker explosion at the target location, inflicting a total of 250% Physical DMG. 10s cooldown.

Name: Chaos Particle
Description: Physical DMG increased by 10%. After a 3-Ping, Basic Attack DMG is increased by 30% for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Raging Red
Description: Fire DMG increased by 10%. When a Red Orb is pinged, Fire DMG is increased by 10% for 5s. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Silent Hunter
Description: Movement Speed is increased by 30% and ATK is increased by 10% for 3s after a 3-Ping. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Heart of Gravel
Description: All DMG dealt increased by 15% for 5s after performing a 3-Ping consecutively. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Fallen Yuanxiao
Description: Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to release a Yuanxiao that deals 15% Physical DMG. 1s cooldown.

Name: Zero Pierce
Description: When attacking an enemy's back with a CRIT Strike, the enemy becomes Impaired and takes 50% of Physical DMG every second for 3 seconds. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. When attacking an Impaired enemy, Physical DMG is increased by 20%.

Name: Soul Strike
Description: All DMG increases by 10%. Dark DMG increases by 10% while under Cosmic Wave state.

Name: Color of Bleakness
Description: All DMG increases by 7% when attacking enemies with Super Armor.

Name: Line Drawing
Description: All DMG increases by 10% for 4s when performing a QTE or 3-Ping skill. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered.

Name: Color Splash
Description: All DMG increases by 2% for 5s when dealing damage to enemies with Super Armor. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration refreshes when the effect is repeatedly triggered. Stuns an enemy for 2s when breaking its Super Armor. 10s cooldown for the same target. Physical DMG increases by 15% for 7s when releasing Vector Cube.
